entry.title: Fedora Tweaks
entry.summary: Speed up DNF First things first, after installing fedora, you should make the dnf package manager faster by adding 2 lines in /etc/dnf/dnf.conf To edit the file run: sudo nano /etc/dnf/dnf.conf Then add these lines to the bottom of the page: max_parallel_downloads=10 fastestmirror=True Reboot and run: sudo dnf update Install Brave Browser on Fedora: sudo dnf install dnf-plugins-core ...
